title: BRIEF-Nacco Industries Q4 Revenue $26.4 Million
text: March 7, 2018 / 10:35 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Nacco Industries Q4 Revenue $26.4 Million Reuters Staff March 7 (Reuters) - Nacco Industries Inc: * NACCO INDUSTRIES, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR 2017 RESULTS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.40 INCLUDING ITEMS * ‍IN 2018, NACCO EXPECTS CONSOLIDATED INCOME BEFORE INCOME TAX FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS TO DECREASE COMPARED WITH 2017​ * SEES 2018 PRE-TAX LOSS TO BE MODESTLY LOWER THAN ITS 2017 PRE-TAX LOSS EXCLUDING ITEMS * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $33 MILLION IN 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
